title: About
body:
### **Some say we never sleep, and that we roam in infi corridor at night foraging for cows.**

### **Some say we are a bunch of nerds who smell nice when we take bath and act like semi-guide for graduate thesis projects.**

### **Some say we are confused at most times and take pride in not able to explain what we do.**

# But we know for sure that we love Mendeley, LaTex, Text, Atlas.TI and Web of Science.

</br> 
Also we need a better high quality picture for this page

> > > >  ## **`(╯°□°)╯︵ ┻━┻ ︵ ╯(°□° ╯)`**
